song.englishname: God Is the King of All the Earth

english.segment1: VERSE. God is the king of all the earth, God is the king of all the earth. Sing to him a psalm of praise. God is the king of all the earth.
english.segment2: CHORUS. Sing, sing, sing, sing praises to God. Sing, sing, sing, sing praises to God. Sing, sing, sing, sing praises to our King. (sing, sing, sing to our king.
english.segment3: VERSE. For the kings of the earth belong to God, the kings of the earth belong to God. Sing to him a psalm of praise. The kings of the earth belong to God.
english.segment4: CHORUS. God is the king of all the earth, God is the king of all the earth. Sing to him a psalm of praise. God is the king of all the earth.
